`````markdown
# 🧠 REHYDRATION.md  
**Project:** my-fitness/  
**Snapshot Date:** 2025-05-01  
**Maintainer:** Alric

---

# 1. 🛠 Origin Timeline

- **Feb 2025** — Restarted machine training after life stress/inactivity  
- **Apr 2025** — Engaged structured AI coaching system  
- **Late Apr 2025** — Developed `my-fitness/` repo + persona-driven planning

---

# 2. 🧹 Behavioral Guardrails

| Rule | Description |
|------|-------------|
| Set 4 Logging | Always log Set 4 weight × reps × RPE unless noted |
| 15/12/10/10 Ramp | Standard ramp-up unless customized |
| RPE Required | RPE tracked per final work set |
| Consistency > Perfection | Focus on streaks, not calories |
| Equipment Logging | Hoist + Matrix model behaviors tracked |
| Weekly Reflections | Use template to reflect, adjust |

---

# 3. 🏋️ Training System

- **3-Day Split (Circuit Machines)**
  - Day 1: Push + Glutes + Core  
  - Day 2: Pull + Arms + Core  
  - Day 3: Legs + Rotation + Core

- **Machines Used**
  - Hoist RS Series  
  - Matrix Versa  
  - Functional Trainer, Cable

- **Progression**
  - Target 8.5–9 RPE on Set 4
  - Volume and ROM before load

---

# 4. 🍽️ Diet Framework

- Snack-based, Zepbound-compatible
- Tracked: Coffee, cereal, soda, evening eating
- Snack prep every Sunday
- Fiber + Protein timing optimized

---

# 5. 📊 Logged Metrics

- **Weight Log:** Up to date to April 2025  
- **Lean Mass Gain:** +5 lbs (Nov–Apr)  
- **Sleep:** Avg 5h36m this week  
- **HRV, RHR:** Apple Watch sync pending

---

# 6. 🧱 System Modules (Files)

- `3x-week-circuit-program.md` — workout structure  
- `notes-2025-04.md` — subjective lifting logs  
- `snack-plan-v1.md`, `prep-guide.md` — diet files  
- `metric-interpretation-guide.md`, `recovery-insights.md` — analytics guides  
- `command-reference.md`, `devices.md` — toolchain  
- `weekly-checkin-template.md` — habit review

---

# 7. 🔮 Future Upgrades

| Area | Plan |
|------|------|
| Apple Sync | Pull in HRV, RHR, sleep, kcal |
| RPE Overlay | Generate charts from `csv` + recovery |
| Free Weights | Transition after machine PR wall |
| Data Merge | Use `chat-data-summary.md` to drive analytics

---

# ✅ Rehydration State
System rehydrated from chat memory  
All logic modularized into files  
Structure export-ready
`````

Here’s your **Week 3 – Day 2: Pull + Arms + Core** full plan — now tuned to match fatigue from Week 3 Day 1, while slightly ramping effort.

---

# ✅ **WEEK 3 – DAY 2**  
**Theme:** Pull + Biceps + Triceps + Core  
**Target RPE:** 8.5–9  
**Session Time:** ~60 min  
**Rest:** 45–60 sec between sets

---

## 🏃 Warm-Up  
- 5 min treadmill @ 3.0 mph

---

## 🟦 PRIMARY LIFTS

### 1. **Lat Pulldown**  
- **Week 2:** 105×10 @ RPE 10  
- **Target:** 100–105 × 10–12 @ RPE 9  
- Focus: Full squeeze, smooth eccentric

---

### 2. **Seated Row / Mid Row**  
- **Week 2:** 145×12 @ RPE 10  
- **Target:** 140–145 × 10 @ RPE 9  
- Cue: Lead with elbow, retract scapula

---

### 3. **Preacher Curl / Cable Curl**  
- **Week 2:** 65×10 @ RPE 10  
- **Target:** 60–65 × 10–12 @ RPE 9  
- Tip: Controlled tempo, no swinging

---

### 4. **Triceps Press / Seated Dip**  
- **Week 2:** 125×9 @ RPE 10  
- **Target:** 120–125 × 10 @ RPE 9  
- Keep elbows tight to avoid shoulder load

---

## 🟨 CORE FINISHERS

### 5. **Full Compression Crunch (Locked)**  
- **Last:** 165×10 @ RPE 8  
- **Target:** 165–170 × 10–12 @ RPE 9  
- Add plate or reps as needed

---

### 6. **Rotating Crunch / Oblique Machine**  
- **Last:** 125×15 (L/R) @ RPE 8  
- **Target:** 130 (L/R) × 15 reps @ RPE 9  
- Variation: Try rotating seat mode if locked last time

---

## 🧊 Cooldown  
- 5 min treadmill walk @ 2.5 → 2.0 mph ramp down

---

To estimate your **Leg Press 1RM** using the **Newgen Formula**, we apply:

> **1RM ≈ Weight × (1 + Reps / 30)**

Your Set 4 on 4/28:  
**280 lbs × 20 reps @ RPE 9**

### ✅ 1RM Calculation:

**1RM ≈ 280 × (1 + 20 / 30)**  
**1RM ≈ 280 × 1.6667 ≈ 467 lbs**

# 🧠 REHYDRATION.md  
**Project:** my-fitness/  
**Snapshot Date:** 2025-05-02  
**Maintainer:** Alric

---

# 1. 🛠 Origin Timeline

- **Feb 2025** — Restarted machine training after life stress/inactivity  
- **Apr 2025** — Engaged structured AI coaching system  
- **Late Apr 2025** — Developed `my-fitness/` repo + persona-driven planning

---

# 2. 🧹 Behavioral Guardrails

| Rule | Description |
|------|-------------|
| Set 4 Logging | Always log Set 4 weight × reps × RPE unless noted |
| 15/12/10/10 Ramp | Standard ramp-up unless customized |
| RPE Required | RPE tracked per final work set |
| Consistency > Perfection | Focus on streaks, not calories |
| Equipment Logging | Hoist + Matrix model behaviors tracked |
| Weekly Reflections | Use template to reflect, adjust |

---

# 3. 🏋️ Training System

- **3-Day Split (Circuit Machines)**
  - Day 1: Push + Glutes + Core  
  - Day 2: Pull + Arms + Core  
  - Day 3: Legs + Rotation + Core

- **Machines Used**
  - Hoist RS Series  
  - Matrix Versa  
  - Functional Trainer, Cable

- **Progression**
  - Target 8.5–9 RPE on Set 4
  - Volume and ROM before load

---

# 4. 🍽️ Diet Framework

- Snack-based, Zepbound-compatible  
- Tracked: Coffee, cereal, soda, evening eating  
- Snack prep every Sunday  
- Fiber + Protein timing optimized

---

# 5. 📊 Logged Metrics

- **Weight Log:** Up to date to April 2025  
- **Leg Press PR:** 280×20 @ RPE 9  
- **Est. Leg Press 1RM:** ~467 lbs  
- **Sleep:** Avg 5h36m  
- **HRV, RHR:** Apple Watch sync pending

---

# 6. 🧱 System Modules (Files)

- `3x-week-circuit-program.md` — workout structure  
- `notes-2025-04.md` — subjective lifting logs  
- `snack-plan-v1.md`, `prep-guide.md` — diet files  
- `metric-interpretation-guide.md`, `recovery-insights.md` — analytics guides  
- `command-reference.md`, `devices.md` — toolchain  
- `weekly-checkin-template.md` — habit review

---

# 7. 🔮 Future Upgrades

| Area | Plan |
|------|------|
| Apple Sync | Pull in HRV, RHR, sleep, kcal |
| RPE Overlay | Generate charts from `csv` + recovery |
| Free Weights | Transition after machine PR wall |
| Data Merge | Use `chat-data-summary.md` to drive analytics

---

System rehydrated from chat memory  
All logic modularized into files  
Structure export-ready
